name: Berlin Subway Map compared to its real geography [OC] - 2017
description: This viral animation was the first to start a map vs geography trend of subway lines on the internet. It depicts a mesmerising morph from the abstract berlin subway map to its real geography. In 2017 it instantly got a lot of traction on r/dataisbeautiful, got #1 on reddit /all, went viral on the internet and lastly started its own special subreddit committed to collecting this kind of graphic animations from all over the world.  Buyers will be written down as official supporters on the subreddit at: https://www.reddit.com/r/MapVsGeo/ and receive a never released high res version of the work on request. The original post can be found here: https://www.reddit.com/r/dataisbeautiful/comments/6baefh/berlin_subway_map_compared_to_its_real_geography/ Selection of websites that wrote about it: The Guardian, Archdaily.com, Digg.com, Observer.com, Qz.com, Vividmaps.com, Irishnews.com, Urbanshit.de, Culturainquieta.com, My Mordern Met, Mentalfloss.com, Thinktank.org.uk
